Compile.description: Source file to be passed to the compiler

EmbeddedResource.description: Embedded resource file to be passed to the compiler

Include.description: The ID of the NuGet package

Version.description: The version of the NuGet package

IncludeAssets.description: Assets that will be consumed by the project

ExcludeAssets.description: Assets that will not be consumed by the project

PrivateAssets.description: Assets that will be consumed by the project but won't flow to its parent

OutputType.description: The kind of output from the compiler, such as an executable or library
